scripts.deploy:development: dotnet lambda deploy-function --function-name Flyingdarts-Backend-Friends-Api-Development  -frun dotnet8 -f net8.0 --region eu-west-1
scripts.deploy:staging: dotnet lambda deploy-function --function-name Flyingdarts-Backend-Friends-Api-Staging  -frun dotnet8 -f net8.0 --region eu-west-1
scripts.deploy:production: dotnet lambda deploy-function --function-name Flyingdarts-Backend-Friends-Api-Production  -frun dotnet8 -f net8.0 --region eu-west-1
